mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) yyyy, MONTH(cashbook_date) mm ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "수입" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "지출" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)- (case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE '' END)) AS "합계" FROM cashbook GROUP BY mm ORDER BY mm DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT cashbook_kind cashbookKind, SUM(cashbook_price) cashbookPrice, day(cashbook_date) day FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{currentYear} AND MONTH(cashbook_date) = #{currentMonth} GROUP BY day(cashbook_date), cashbookKind
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cashbook( category_name, cashbook_content, cashbook_kind, cashbook_price, cashbook_date, create_date, update_date )VALUES( #{categoryName}, #{cashbookContent}, #{cashbookKind}, #{cashbookPrice}, #{cashbookDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
